about_the_game:
Slow and Run .

In a slow motion universe. Slow and Run was inspired of many films.
You will have kill or arrest all your enemies for end this game
Game create with Unreal Engine 4.
We actually work on a update for make of this game a multiplayer game .

Slow and Run .

In a slow motion universe. Slow and Run was inspired of many films.
You will have kill or arrest all your enemies for end this game

name: Slow And Run Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Lowest CPU tested : Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo T6400 @2.00 GHz 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Lowest GPU tested : NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
  • Additional Notes: Those specs are actually subjective. We need the players feedback to be sure about the minimal configuration our game needs.
